articles.title: VenHub Opens Its First 24/7, Autonomous Smart Store in Southern California
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: VenHub is launching a new autonomous retail solution featuring a modular design and AI-driven platform. The solution aims to reduce building and operating costs, ensure precise product handling and efficient inventory management, and provide a smooth, unattended retail experience.

articles.title: VenHub Opens Its First 24/7, Autonomous Smart Store in Southern California
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: VenHub introduces an autonomous retail solution featuring a modular design, reducing costs. Their AI-driven platform ensures precise product handling and efficient inventory management. The solution aims to transform retail environments with a more accessible and cost-effective model.

articles.title: VenHub Opens Its First 24/7, Autonomous Smart Store in Southern California
articles.author: Ven Hub
articles.summary: VenHub Global, Inc. launched its first fully autonomous Smart Store located in North Hollywood, California. The Smart Store features a modular design to reduce costs and uses VenHub's robotics and AI-driven platform for efficient inventory management and a smooth retail experience. This store was sold to a VenHub customer who aims to introduce a next-generation shopping experience.

articles.title: Thread by @ilanbigio on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: OpenAI has announced a new function calling guide featuring key changes like being 50% shorter and clearer, new best practices, in-doc function generation, and a fully functional example with a weather API. The guide provides advice on writing clear functions and applying software engineering best practices to improve model function.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its ‘Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: WYATTE GRANTHAM-PHILIPS
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing items at home before purchase. The service will wind down, with the last day for orders being January 31. Amazon cites the program's limited reach and the increasing use of AI-powered features for sizing recommendations as the reason for this change.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its ‘Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: WYATTE GRANTHAM-PHILIPS
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try apparel items at home before purchase. This decision is due to the service's limited reach and the increasing use of AI-powered sizing recommendations. Amazon will continue to offer free returns on apparel and aims to provide a simpler experience with a larger selection and faster delivery.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its ‘Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: WYATTE GRANTHAM-PHILIPS
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing items before purchasing. The company is replacing it with AI-powered features such as virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations to improve the customer experience and reduce costs associated with returns.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing, shoes, and accessories at home before purchasing. The last day for eligible customers to place orders using this benefit is January 31.

articles.title: Amazon is selling an ‘outstanding' $150 jump starter for just $70
articles.author: Gabe Carey
articles.summary: Gooloo's GT3000 jump starter, compatible with various vehicles, features a 16,000mAh battery, multiple ports including USB-C with 100W power delivery, and an LED display showing battery life. The GT3000 holds charge for up to two years and also contains a 400-lumen emergency light. The product is currently on sale for $70, a 34% discount.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members - WNKY News 40 Television
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allows Prime members to try on select clothing items at home before purchasing. The last day for eligible customers to place orders through the program is January 31. This decision is due to the program's limited reach and increased reliance on AI-powered sizing recommendations.

articles.title: 'My new best friend': Score this iRobot Roomba vac/mop for over 30% off
articles.author: Britt Ross
articles.summary: iRobot Roomba Robot Vacuum & Mop is currently on sale at Amazon with a discount of over 30%. The 2-in-1 appliance has a four-stage cleaning system that can vacuum and mop simultaneously. The robot also runs for up to two hours before needing to recharge.

articles.title: Best Foods Just Got Bougie With Three Bold New Flavours!
articles.author: Straterra Inc
articles.summary: Best Foods has introduced three new flavors to its mayonnaise range: Peri Peri Mayo, Truffle Mayo, and Chunky Burger Sauce. Peri Peri Mayo and Chunky Burger sauce are currently available in supermarkets for $5.99, while Truffle Mayo will be released soon. These new sauces aim to cater to the growing demand for versatile condiments and elevate at-home dining experiences.

articles.title: Guayakí Yerba Mate Strengthens Nationwide Distribution Network to Accelerate Growth
articles.author: Guayaki Yerba Mate
articles.summary: Guayakí Yerba Mate has released a promotional photo, suggesting news related to their product offerings.

articles.title: Hanging out at Starbucks will cost you as company reverses its open-door policy
articles.author: Lisa André
articles.summary: Starbucks now requires customers to make a purchase in order to use the restroom or seating within their stores. This policy change updates the previous service offering regarding access to store amenities.

articles.title: Samsung Confirms Galaxy S25 Ultra Offers, Pre-Orders And Release Dates
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Registrations are open for the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra. Information on pre-order dates and the official sale date is anticipated.

articles.title: 6 baby safe laundry detergents, recommended by dermatologists
articles.author: Bethany Heitman
articles.summary: The article discusses several baby-safe laundry detergents recommended by experts and NBC staffers. Brands like Dreft, Babyganics 3X, All Free and Clear, and Tide Free & Gentle are highlighted for their hypoallergenic, fragrance-free, and dye-free formulas. These detergents are designed to be gentle on baby skin, minimizing irritation from dyes, fragrances, and harsh chemicals.

articles.title: MSI's New Gaming PC Has a Touchscreen Case, and I'm Slightly Obsessed
articles.author: Patrick Campanale
articles.summary: MSI announced the MEG VISION X AI 2nd generation gaming tower at CES 2025, featuring a built-in 13-inch 1080p touchscreen on the front of the PC case. This pre-built PC includes NVIDIA's RTX 5000-series graphics cards and Intel's 2nd generation of Core Ultra processors, along with a built-in mic and speaker, offering a ready-to-go, customizable desktop experience.

articles.title: POCO X7 Series: Mid-Range Smartphones with Flagship Features, Jumbo Battery, and Premium Design
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: POCO has launched the X7 Series, featuring the X7 Pro with a Dimensity 8400 Ultra processor and the X7 with a Dimensity 7300 Ultra chipset. The X7 Pro boasts a 6000mAh battery with 90W HyperCharge, while the X7 has a 5110mAh battery with 45W fast charging. Both models include a 50MP Sony IMX882 main camera with OIS and are designed with attention to durability and aesthetics.

articles.title: This portable, lightweight Linux distro has an old-school feel
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: 4MLinux is introduced as a feature-oriented, lightweight Linux distribution designed to revitalize old computers. It functions as a rescue CD, supports multimedia files, and can operate as a server for FSP, FTP, HTTP, and other services.

articles.title: This small 4K projector is worthy of replacing your TV - and gets plenty bright for its size
articles.author: Prakhar Khanna
articles.summary: Xgimi launched the Horizon S Max projector featuring a built-in rotating stand for easy screen placement. The new Xgimi projector retains a sliding cover to protect the lens from dust and includes two USB 2.0 ports and an HDMI (eARC) port.

articles.title: I drove the high-performance version of Hyundai's Ioniq 5 EV. It's like driving a rally car — until the battery runs out.
articles.author: bzhang@businessinsider.com
articles.summary: Hyundai launched the Ioniq 5 N, a new high-performance variant of the Ioniq 5, in 2024. This new variant is designed to compete with vehicles like the Ford Mustang Mach-E GT and Tesla Model Y Performance.

articles.title: Move over Tasman: UGG's latest Tazz is the next must-have slipper for winter
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: UGG has launched the new Tazz Sunwave Slipper, which is available in a specific design. This new product also includes a design for kids. The new UGG Tazz Sunwave Slipper can be purchased at designated retailers.

articles.title: New Braunfels Utilities' new customer solutions center location now open
articles.author: Staff report
articles.summary: New Braunfels Utilities (NBU) has opened a new customer solutions center at 1488 S. Seguin Ave., offering in-person service and a drive-up payment dropoff. Simultaneously, NBU has permanently closed its downtown lobby and ended its drive-thru payment service.

articles.title: Dickey's Barbecue Adds New Rancher's Premium Smokehouse Bacon Cheddar Sausage to Walmart ...
articles.author: Dickey S Barbecue Restaurants
articles.summary: Rancher's Premium, launched by Dickey's Barbecue, has released a new product: the Bacon Cheddar Sausage. This sausage, crafted by Chef Matt Burton, is now available at Walmart stores nationwide and online. Rancher's Premium also provides recipes on their website to help customers enjoy the new product.

articles.title: LG says new pet detergent removes '98 percent' of animal odor
articles.author: 미국주식 사관학교
articles.summary: LG Household & Health Care introduced Pet Family, a new brand specializing in pet products, on January 13th. One of the first products announced is FiJi detergent, which the company claims removes 98% of pet odor and 90% of hair in a single wash.

articles.title: Subscription Savings Startup "Bundled" Waitlist Explodes Past 150,000
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Bundled, a startup focused on managing subscription costs, announced its waitlist exceeded 150,000 users. It plans to launch fully in Q2 2025, partnering with brands across various sectors to provide savings to consumers and small businesses.

articles.title: Subscription Savings Startup "Bundled" Waitlist Explodes Past 150,000
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Bundled, a new platform launching in Q2 2025, aims to provide significant savings (50-70%) on streaming, food, fitness, and other subscriptions for consumers and small businesses. Bundled offers features like one-click cancellations, a single login for all subscriptions, extended free trials, and cashback, with the goal of simplifying subscription management.

articles.title: URSROBOT Celebrates a Successful Showcase of NEXMOW M2 at CES 2025
articles.author: Ursrobot Inc.
articles.summary: URSROBOT showcased NEXMOW M2, an advanced AI-driven landscaping solution, at CES 2025. NEXMOW M2 represents a new product offering from URSROBOT in the landscaping sector, indicating an introduction or launch of a new service.

articles.title: This Is Not A Drill: The Newest Gen iPad Mini Is At An All-Time Low — And We Don't Think It'll Last
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Apple launched the seventh generation of iPad Mini in October 2024, featuring an A17 Pro chip for enhanced AI capabilities and performance. The new iPad Mini is currently on sale on Amazon at a discounted price of $399, which is 20% off the original price of $499. It includes features such as Apple Intelligence (AI), improved Siri with ChatGPT integration, and a 12 MP camera.

articles.title: Just Salad Opens Livingston Store With Company's First Drive-Thru
articles.author: Eric Kiefer
articles.summary: Just Salad has launched its first drive-thru location in Livingston, offering a convenient option for customers seeking quick, healthy meals. The drive-thru is integrated with dine-in services and offers the full Just Salad menu, including salads, wraps, bowls, soups, and smoothies. To celebrate the grand opening, Just Salad is offering various promotions, including giveback days and discounted meals.

articles.title: Walmart's new look was inspired by founder Sam Walton's iconic trucker hat
articles.author: Dominick Reuter
articles.summary: Walmart has unveiled its latest brand refresh, the first major change in 17 years. The new logo draws retro inspiration from founder Sam Walton's iconic trucker hats. The company says the "True Blue" and "Spark Yellow" evoke its past and look forward to a more digital future as the company aims to push beyond traditional brick-and-mortar retail and take a bigger bite of the e-commerce market.

articles.title: 20 of best Amazon purchases Yahoo Canada shopping experts made in 2024 (and 5 of the worst)
articles.author: Yahoo Canada Shopping Editors
articles.summary: Yahoo Canada shopping experts reviewed various Amazon purchases made in 2024, including a budget-friendly TV, a fabric shaver, and a rechargeable water flosser. Other recommended products included retinol eye masks, hydrocolloid patches for acne, and Joydeco Blackout Curtains, Clinique's Black Honey Almost Lipstick, and Kobo Clara Black & White e-reader, essential oil diffuser, heatless curler and Amazon Basics Vacuum Storage Bags. The reviewers provided insights into the products' functionality, benefits, and potential drawbacks.

articles.title: A New Kind of Video Doorbell From SwitchBot Solves a Long-Term Problem
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: SwitchBot introduced a new video doorbell at CES 2025 featuring a 4.3-inch touchscreen display for easy interaction. The doorbell boasts 2K resolution, a 165-degree viewing angle, color night vision, AI motion detection, and optional adhesive mounting, aiming for user-friendliness and easy setup.

articles.title: Edge, By Pinnacle Live: Pinnacle Live positioned to disrupt experiential event space
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Pinnacle Live has launched Edge by Pinnacle Live, a full-service experience agency focused on integrated brand activations and live events. Edge aims to enhance brand-audience relationships by merging technology with the human experience, offering services across all verticals for brand campaigns and strategy consultation.

articles.title: Edge, By Pinnacle Live: Pinnacle Live positioned to disrupt experiential event space
articles.author: Pinnacle Live
articles.summary: Pinnacle Live has launched Edge by Pinnacle Live, a new full-service experience agency. Edge is dedicated to delivering integrated, immersive brand activations and live events. The agency is founded by event veterans and focuses on innovative marketing campaigns.

articles.title: The Dyson V8 Origin Cordless Vacuum Is At A Deep Discount Exclusively At Target
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Target is offering the Dyson V8 Origin cordless vacuum for a discounted price of $299.99, which is 30% off the usual retail price. The cordless vacuum is lightweight, designed for easy use on floors, furniture, and ceilings, and comes with multiple cleaning tools and a docking station.

articles.title: B&M fans say £1.99 vanilla scented lip oil is 'better' than Sol De Janeiro
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: B&M has introduced a Sol Beauty Lip Oil, a budget-friendly alternative to Sol De Janeiro's lip butter. Priced at £1.99, the lip oil features a salted caramel and vanilla fragrance and aims to hydrate lips with cocoa and shea butter.

articles.title: The best nonstick pans of 2025, tested and reviewed
articles.author: Lisa Schweitzer
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares several nonstick frying pans in 2025 from brands including Hexclad, Oxo Good Grips, Le Creuset, Made In, and Misen. It tests the pans' performance in tasks like cooking eggs, searing salmon, and making pancakes, considering factors such as handle temperature, surface slickness, and heat distribution. The review offers recommendations based on budget, individual needs, and cooking habits.

articles.title: Amazon shuts down Prime 'Try Before You Buy' program in favor of new AI features
articles.author: Rob Thubron
articles.summary: Amazon is shutting down its 'Prime Try Before You Buy' service on January 31, after seven years of operation. The company cites the popularity of its AI-powered features and a desire to reduce return volumes as key factors in the decision. The service allowed customers to try up to six clothing, shoes, and accessories items before purchasing.

articles.title: Festool Celebrates 100 Years of Innovative & Groundbreaking Power Tool Solutions
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Festool is celebrating its 100-year anniversary in 2025 with limited-edition releases and exclusive versions of select products. Throughout its history, Festool has launched innovative products such as the portable chainsaw in 1927, the SB126 circular saw in 1930, and the ExoActive exoskeleton in 2024. The company is dedicated to developing high-quality tools and systems designed to meet the needs of trade professionals.

articles.title: Yadea hits 100 million units in global sales, with the new announcement of global ambassador Dylan Wang
articles.author: antaranews.com
articles.summary: Yadea, a leading electric two-wheeler brand, has reached 100 million in global sales. Simultaneously, Yadea has announced Dylan Wang as its global brand ambassador. This partnership signifies Yadea's intention to connect with younger consumers and strengthen its brand image.

articles.title: B&M shoppers say they 'need' £1.99 lip oil inspired by popular Sol de Janeiro scent
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: B&M has launched Sol Beauty Lip Oil, a budget-friendly lip product retailing for £1.99, designed to provide essential moisture and a sweet salted caramel and vanilla scent, similar to Sol De Janeiro's lip butter. The product, infused with cocoa and shea butter, is being promoted on B&M's Instagram and has gained traction on TikTok.

articles.title: B&M shoppers 'need' £1.99 lip oil that's 'better' than Sol de Janeiro version
articles.author: Nicola Roy Trends Writer
articles.summary: B&M has introduced the Sol Beauty Lip Oil, a £1.99 product with a salted caramel and vanilla scent, similar to Sol De Janeiro's lip butter. The company promoted this new lip oil through its official Instagram account urging customers to buy the viral product.

articles.title: Industry Innovator Dave Meeker Joins S4 Capital's Monks
articles.author: Monks
articles.summary: The Monks brand introduces an integrated portfolio of services. This portfolio aims to maximize client revenue growth, innovation, and reach. The brand emphasizes cross-vertical and end-to-end capabilities.

articles.title: Old World Christmas® Announces New Partnerships for 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Old World Christmas is debuting new ornaments featuring brands like Big League Chew, The Lumistella Company, Mondelēz, Penguin Young Readers, Pink Floyd, Richard Scarry, The Beach Boys, and The Who. This expansion aims to offer consumers more memories on their Christmas trees through licensed product lines.

articles.title: Wayfair just slashed the price of the viral Ninja CREAMi for a limited time
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering the Ninja CREAMi Deluxe 11-in-1 Ice Cream & Frozen Treat Maker at a discounted price of $230 (originally $250). This appliance allows users to create various frozen treats with its 11 programs, XL capacity tubs, and customizable options. The Creami utilizes advanced Creamify Technology.

articles.title: Wayfair just slashed the price of the viral Ninja CREAMi for a limited time
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering discounts on Ninja kitchen appliances, including the Ninja CREAMi and Ninja CREAMi Deluxe, during its 72 Hour Clearout sale. The Ninja CREAMi Deluxe 11-in-1 Ice Cream & Frozen Treat Maker allows users to create various frozen treats at home, including ice cream, sorbet, milkshakes, and frozen yogurt.

articles.title: Madurai Aavin launches 50ml ghee jar ahead of Pongal
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Aavin's Madurai unit has introduced a new 50ml ghee jar to cater to the demand for smaller quantities during the Pongal festival. The 50ml jar is sold for ₹48 and is intended for immediate usage or limited portions.

articles.title: Kmart Australia shoppers are loving a $4 cleaning gadget
articles.author: BELINDA CLEARY
articles.summary: Kmart has introduced a 'mini retractable mop' priced at $4, designed for cleaning countertops. Initial customer reactions, as seen on TikTok, are divided, with some praising its effectiveness and convenience, while others question its necessity compared to existing cleaning methods.

articles.title: Kmart Australia shoppers love a $4 cleaning device
articles.author: Belinda Cleary
articles.summary: Kmart has launched a $4 'mini retractable mop' designed for cleaning countertops. The product is receiving mixed reactions from shoppers, with some calling it a 'game changer' for kitchen cleanup, while others question its necessity compared to traditional cleaning methods.

articles.title: Adobe Firefly Bulk Create edits several images all at once
articles.summary: Adobe is launching Bulk Create, an AI-powered web app that allows users to change backgrounds and resize images without needing a Photoshop license.  Currently in private beta, it is expected to be generally available in the first quarter of the year. Bulk Create addresses the issue of high volume image editing demands for enterprise creative teams by offering cost-effective editing features.

articles.title: 7 of the best alcohol-free brands to try
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Several companies have launched or offer alcohol-free versions of their popular products. Nozeco offers alcohol-free prosecco, while BERO is a premium non-alcoholic beer. CleanCo provides alcohol-free spirits, Gordon's produces alcohol-free gin, Kopparberg serves alcohol-free ciders, Heineken offers alcohol-free beer, and Funkin Nitro has an alcohol-free range of canned mocktails.

articles.title: OnePlus 13 Launch: The Evolution of Flagship Innovation
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 13 globally. The company continues to offer high-performance devices at competitive prices and aims to push the boundaries of smartphone technology with this launch.

articles.title: Adobe's new AI tool can edit 10,000 images in one click
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Adobe is launching 'Firefly Bulk Create,' a new generative AI tool for batch image editing, and making new Firefly Services developer APIs generally available.  These APIs include 'Dubbing and Lip Sync' for video translation and lip movement editing, and a new InDesign tool for automatic text and image formatting.  Additionally, 'Digital avatars' created from text and voice recordings will be available in beta for video presentations and product explainers, all aimed at speeding up production workflows.

articles.title: Adobe Firefly Bulk Create edits several images all at once
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Adobe has launched Adobe Firefly Bulk Create, a web application connected to Adobe Firefly Services. This product allows users to edit multiple photos at once using AI to change backgrounds and resize images, catering to the needs of enterprise creatives for updating website and social media content. Currently in private beta, it is expected to be generally available in the first quarter of the year.

articles.title: HTeaO Partners with Detroit Labs, Paytronix, and Growth Factor to Unveil a World-Class Tech Suite, Elevating the Guest Experience
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: HTeaO has launched a new mobile app developed with Detroit Labs, featuring online ordering, secure payments, and customizable tea and coffee options. They've also introduced a loyalty program powered by Paytronix where customers earn points for every dollar spent, unlocking rewards. Furthermore, HTeaO has launched a revamped website created with Growth Factor, offering integrated store locators, enhanced e-commerce, and seamless navigation.

articles.title: The perfume is sold for NIS 1,000, how much would you be willing to pay for one spray?
articles.author: DANIEL COHEN
articles.summary: AromaVend Israel introduced a perfume vending machine in Ayalon Mall, offering access to luxury perfumes for a fee. Similarly, BEAUTY Couture Place in Zichron Ya'acov also installed a perfume vending machine with slightly different pricing and perfume selection. Both machines aim to provide customers with convenient access to luxury perfumes, with AromaVend planning to expand to other locations.

articles.title: 2025 Zeekr 7X review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: Zeekr, a Chinese brand, has introduced new models including the Zeekr X small SUV and the Zeekr 009 luxury people mover. These models are already available to buyers.

articles.title: FHRAI raises concerns over Zomato, Swiggy's 'private label' food delivery foray
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Zomato, according to Albinder Dhindsa, will not launch private brands on the Zomato app to compete with restaurant partners. This decision is why the mentioned service is not being developed within Zomato.

articles.title: Tecno Phantom V Fold 2 review: A step towards making foldables accessible
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Tecno has launched the Phantom V Fold 2, a book-style foldable smartphone. The phone features a 6.42-inch cover screen and a 7.85-inch main screen, powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9000+ chipset and a 5,750mAh battery, aiming to provide an accessible foldable experience at a competitive price of Rs 79,999 in India. Tecno also included a 50-megapixel triple camera system.

articles.title: It's time to stop making dumb AI wearables
articles.author: Jesus Diaz
articles.summary: Humane launched its AI pin in early 2024 after raising $230 million, aiming for 100,000 units sold but only achieving 10,000 with a high return rate of 30%. Rabbit sold an estimated 50,000 units of its AI device at $199, generating almost $10 million in sales against a $64.7 million investment.

articles.title: SpaceX or Blue Origin?: How does Elon Musk's Falcon 9 fare against Jeff Bezos' New Glenn? Explained
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Blue Origin planned the inaugural launch of its New Glenn rocket, intended to break into the satellite launch market. The New Glenn rocket is designed for reusability and can carry a payload of 45 tons. New Glenn will play a pivotal role in Amazon's Project Kuiper, a satellite internet service.

articles.title: TruFood and Bar Bakers Unite as Tandem Foods, Redefining Customer Partnership in the Better-For-You Snack Industry
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: TruFood Manufacturing and Bar Bakers have merged and rebranded as Tandem Foods, a contract manufacturer specializing in better-for-you snacks. Tandem Foods has launched a new website (www.tandemfoods.com) and is focused on delivering high-quality products and innovation in the snack market. The brand emphasizes collaboration and customer partnership.

articles.title: TruFood and Bar Bakers Unite as Tandem Foods, Redefining Customer Partnership in the Better-For-You Snack Industry
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: TruFood Manufacturing and Bar Bakers have launched a unified brand identity called Tandem Foods, specializing in better-for-you snacks. This launch integrates expertise and strengths under a single identity. Tandem Foods has also redesigned its website, highlighting enhanced capabilities and offerings.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer's new £40 cotton dress with 'flattering waist' is gorgeous for spring
articles.author: Megan Archer-Fox
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer is releasing its spring collection, which includes a new dress. Next also features a new cotton dress.

articles.title: ASUS reveals launch date for ZenFone 12 Ultra, its new flagship
articles.author: Kristijan Lucic
articles.summary: ASUS has announced the launch date for its new flagship phone, the ZenFone 12 Ultra, on February 6. The company teases the phone's AI and camera capabilities, hinting at a focus on mobile photography excellence. The launch event will kick off at 2:30 PM (GMT+8).

articles.title: Pollo AI Releases Multi-Model Support, Offering All-in-One Video Generation Capabilities  Jan. 13, 2025 11:48
articles.summary: Pollo AI launched a new feature providing multi-model support for its AI video generation platform. Users can now select from popular AI video models like Kling AI, Hailuo AI, Runway, Vidu AI, Luma AI, and PixVerse within Pollo AI's text-to-video and image-to-video generators. This enhances customization and versatility for video creators.

articles.title: Bynder Showcases Its New and Expanded AI Capabilities at NRF to Help Retailers Drive Personalized Content Experiences
articles.author: Manisha Mehta
articles.summary: Bynder is showcasing its new AI innovations at the NRF retail show in New York, highlighting its Natural Language Search functionality. This feature allows DAM users to quickly find images by describing them in major languages. Currently, Bynder has over 500 customers utilizing its existing AI Search capabilities.

articles.title: Bynder Showcases Its New and Expanded AI Capabilities at NRF to Help Retailers Drive Personalized Content Experiences
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Bynder has launched new AI-powered features, including Natural Language Search to find images by description, an AI-assisted Duplicate Image Finder for improved DAM organization, and adaptive streaming with CX Omnichannel, enhancing content delivery and measurement capabilities. These updates aim to boost conversions and marketing efficiency for retailers.

articles.title: Just 56 Things That Renters Swear By And You Might Too — Even If You Own Your Own Home
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article presents a curated list of newly launched cleaning and home improvement products available on Amazon. These products range from mold and mildew removers to organizational tools, all aimed at making rental living more comfortable and manageable. The products are accompanied by user reviews and purchase links, showcasing their effectiveness in addressing common rental-related issues.

articles.title: Bynder Showcases Its New and Expanded AI Capabilities at NRF to Help Retailers Drive Personalized Content Experiences
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Bynder is launching new AI-powered features for its DAM platform. These innovations include Natural Language Search for quick image retrieval, an AI-assisted Duplicate Image Finder, and adaptive streaming enhancements for CX Omnichannel, aimed at boosting content delivery and marketing efficiency for retailers.

articles.title: NARS Arrives in India via Nykaa: A Beauty Game-Changer
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: NARS Cosmetics launched in India on January 10th, 2025, partnering with Nykaa to offer products like the Light Reflecting Foundation and Orgasm Blush. This expansion aims to meet the growing demand for premium beauty products in the Indian market and establish NARS as a prominent player.

articles.title: NewGen Launches Innovative Lifetime Egg Freezing Service to Address Growing Market Need in Asia
articles.author: New Gen IVF Limited
articles.summary: NewGenIvf Group Limited has launched an innovative lifetime egg freezing service in Asia, designed to meet the growing needs of women in the region. This 'one charge, no worries' solution allows customers a one-time payment for lifetime egg freezing, addressing the increasing demand for such services.

articles.title: Customers Rave About Superfinn Lavender Toilet Gel from Action for Under 1 Euro
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Superfinn has launched a new toilet gel available in lavender and lemon scents. The product is known for its affordability at 0.98 euros, cleaning effectiveness, and eco-friendly formulation. Some users reported purple stains on white surfaces.

articles.title: Countdown to mystery product from Insta360. After taking on GoPro and DJI, what's next?
articles.author: Adam Juniper
articles.summary: Insta360 is teasing a new product launch on January 16th.  While speculation exists about the nature of the product, including possibilities related to their X4 camera line or a new gimbal, the company is preparing to introduce something new to the market.

articles.title: Xiaomi Pad 7's purple patch emerges from an unconventional generational transition
articles.author: Vishal Mathur
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the Pad 7, a new tablet with an 11.2-inch display and a Snapdragon 7+ Gen3 chip. The entry-level 8GB+128GB model is priced at ₹26,999, while the 12GB+256GB variant costs ₹29,999, and a nano-texture display edition is available for ₹31,999. Xiaomi is also offering the Focus Keyboard (₹8,999) and the Focus Pen (₹5,999) as accessories to enhance the Pad 7's functionality.

articles.title: Teendow D20S Max+ launches: The Smartest Robot Vacuum Tailored for Pet Families
articles.author: California
articles.summary: Teendow launched the D20S Max+ Robot Vacuum, designed for pet owners. This device features 3-in-1 functionality (sweeping, mopping, and pet grooming), SLAM laser navigation, and a 3L self-emptying dustbin. The D20S Max+ Robot Vacuum is now available for purchase.

articles.title: Samsung Could Have Bad News For Galaxy S25 Ultra Buyers This Year: Know More
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 series, including the Ultra model, with potential changes to the S Pen functionality. The Galaxy S25 Ultra might see the removal of Bluetooth support for the S Pen, which would limit some of its features like click to capture and remote access.

articles.title: Mymanu Introduces Orb: World's First Open-Ear Live Call Translation Earbuds at CES2025
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Mymanu launched Orb earbuds on January 13, 2025. Orb is described as the world's first open-ear earbuds featuring real-time call translation across multiple languages, combining AI-powered translation with high-definition sound quality.

articles.title: Al-Futtaim unveils ‘Blue AI', a smart lifestyle advisor made in the UAE
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: Al-Futtaim has launched Blue AI, a new feature within the Blue Rewards app, designed to enhance customer engagement. Blue AI offers tailored insights, product recommendations, test drive bookings, and a simplified multi-brand checkout experience, aiming to create a more intuitive and enjoyable shopping journey for over five million Blue Rewards customers.

articles.title: Teendow D20S Max+ launches: The Smartest Robot Vacuum Tailored for Pet Families
articles.summary: Teendow has launched the D20S Max+ Robot Vacuum, designed for pet owners. This device features 3-in-1 functionality (sweeping, mopping, and pet grooming), 6000Pa suction, a 3L self-emptying dustbin, PreciSense LiDAR navigation, and a 5000mAh battery. The vacuum is available for purchase on Teendow's website.

articles.title: LG says new pet detergent removes '98 percent' of animal odor
articles.summary: LG Household & Health Care launched Pet Family, a new brand specialized for families with pets. The brand's first product, FiJi detergent, removes 98% of pet odor and 90% of hair in one wash.

articles.title: The Industry's First Cloud-Free Disposable is Coming: NEXA ULTRA InvisaCloud Edition
articles.author: NEXA
articles.summary: NEXA has launched the NEXA ULTRA InvisaCloud Edition, a cloud-free vape device. This product features a sleek design with a 3D curved screen offering dual modes, a crystal tank, and two power modes delivering up to 50,000 puffs. It comes in five flavors inspired by magical worlds.

articles.title: Reunite Over A Fabulous Feast: Maria's Steakcafe's CNY Specials Await You [Review]
articles.author: Adeline Leong
articles.summary: Maria's Steakcafe is introducing three new Chinese New Year set menus: the Abundance Seafood Set, the Abundance Meat Set, and the Prosperity Surf and Turf Set, available until February 12, 2025. The Prosperity Surf and Turf Set, which serves 10, includes dishes such as Yee Sang, Scallops with Tomato & Olive Salsa, and Argentinian Striploin.

articles.title: L'Oral's new skincare gadget told me I should try retinol
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: L'Oreal has launched a new skincare gadget. The gadget recommends using retinol.

articles.title: Hyundai Pakistan launches all-new SONATA N Line
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Hyundai Pakistan launched the Sonata N Line on January 12, 2025, at the Expo Center, Lahore. The Sonata N Line features a Smartstream 2.5 Turbo GDI engine, an 8-speed dual-clutch transmission, and over 20 Hyundai Smart Sense ADAS features, and it's available for booking at Hyundai dealerships nationwide for PKR 15,890,000.

articles.title: Novita, a bathroom company, is entering the shower product market after bidet. Novita has steadily r..
articles.author: Lee Yu-jin
articles.summary: Novita, a bathroom company, has launched a new product line of showerheads, including the 'Monster Shower Head,' featuring various spray modes like rain, monster, mist, and massage. The showerheads, also include the slide showerhead product that controls the water flow with a silicone nozzle for hygienic management. The product is available for advance reservation on Coupang.

articles.title: I've got washing coming out of my ears but an airer's changed the game – I can get two loads on it & it's only £20
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Jordan, a busy mum, recommends the Rainberg airer priced at £19.99, emphasizing its ability to hold two loads of washing and its portability with wheels. She claims the airer is a game changer and better than traditional folding airers, recommending it to other busy parents.

articles.title: Sonakshi Sinha Launches Maternity Brand ‘EZIMom'; Sparks Pregnancy Rumours
articles.author: Snehashish roy
articles.summary: Sonakshi Sinha launched EZIMom, a new brand venturing into the maternity care space. The brand represents a new product introduction within that market.

articles.title: Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer 2025: Iconic Upgrade with Skincare Benefits
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Laura Mercier is launching an updated Tinted Moisturizer Natural Dewy SPF 30 in 2025, featuring a formula that contains 88% skincare ingredients, hyaluronic acid for 24-hour hydration, and SPF 30 for sun protection.  The product offers 16-hour wear and is available in 20 shades to suit various skin tones and is available at Space NK.

articles.title: Quick service restaurant Boba Bhai raises Rs 30 crore in round led by 8i Ventures
articles.author: Jessica Rajan
articles.summary: Boba Bhai, a QSR brand specializing in bubble tea, plans to roll out its Korean-inspired ice cream range across the country, currently in the pilot stage. The brand also aims to introduce new flavors and products, with expectations that the ice cream vertical will significantly contribute to revenue.

articles.title: Save £75 on 'amazing value' cordless vacuum with hundreds of five-star reviews
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: The SMOTURE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, featuring an upgraded 550W brushless motor with 45Kpa suction, is now available on Amazon for £129.99. It offers 60 minutes of operation in ECO mode and includes wall-mounted charging technology and versatile fittings. User reviews highlight its silent operation, sleek design, and impressive runtime.

articles.title: The Roborock Q5 Pro vacuum and mop combo returns to its best price ever
articles.author: Jay Bonggolto
articles.summary: Roborock has launched the Q5 Pro, a robot vacuum and mop featuring strong 5,500Pa suction, dual rubber brushes, and a 770ml dustbin. The Q5 Pro uses LiDAR navigation, offers up to 240 minutes of runtime, and is controllable via the Roborock app and voice assistants. It is currently available at a discounted price of $140.

articles.title: Fusedpage.ai Launches AI Workflows and Digital Twin-Based Video Profiles in Beta for Professionals and Small Businesses
articles.summary: Fusedpage.ai has launched its AI-powered brand video profiles through a Beta program. This new service is designed for career-focused professionals and small businesses, offering a way to create personalized videos to stand out. Early adopters will receive a 25% discount and the opportunity to influence product development.

articles.title: The Audi Q7 Redefines What It Means To Drive In Style And Comfort  The Breakfast Club
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Audi introduces the Q7, emphasizing its style and comfort, aiming to redefine the driving experience.

articles.title: World stumped by detail in Californian Target store
articles.author: Claudia Poposki
articles.summary: In 2023, Woolworths stores implemented security measures by locking up deodorant cans in certain locations, requiring staff assistance for purchase. Similarly, Coles secured Capilano Manuka Honey and Lucas' Papaw Ointment due to their high value or theft concerns, altering the shopping experience for these products.

articles.title: Windows 24H2 is a nightmare for handheld PC gamers right now, and that's why Bazzite is an absolute must for the Asus ROG Ally
articles.author: Isaiah Williams
articles.summary: Bazzite, a cloud-native image built from Fedora Atomic Desktops is a Linux experience similar to SteamOS and can be installed on handheld and desktop PCs. Valve's SteamOS will be available on other handhelds and is launching on the Lenovo Legion Go S in May.

articles.title: Pollo AI Releases Multi-Model Support, Offering All-in-One Video Generation Capabilities
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Pollo AI launched a new feature providing multi-model support on its platform. Users can now select from popular AI video models like Kling AI, Hailuo AI, Runway, Vidu AI, Luma AI, and PixVerse within Pollo AI's text-to-video and image-to-video generators.

articles.title: Transforming Images with Cutting-Edge Tools: A Deep Dive into Image Extender and Background Remover
articles.author: Nick Mwangi
articles.summary: The Image Extender and Background RemoverAI are introduced as new AI-powered tools designed to enhance and customize images. The Image Extender increases image size without distortion, while the Background Remover isolates subjects by eliminating backgrounds. These tools offer solutions for various creative and professional needs, including graphic design, photography, e-commerce, and advertising.

articles.title: ​KOI Thé and AEON Cambodia sign memorandum of understanding to launch new product, YAKULT GREEN TEA​
articles.summary: KOI Thé Cambodia and AEON Cambodia have launched Yakult Green Tea, a new beverage combining Japanese-standard Yakult yogurt and Taiwanese tea. This collaboration introduces the first Yakult Green Tea in Cambodia, offering a blend of sweet and sour flavors with health benefits.

articles.title: CES 2025: Beverage Startups Changing How We Consume Water, Coffee And Beer
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: CES 2025 showcased innovative beverage products. These included dispensers turning air into water and AI-integrated home brewers.

articles.title: Ossetra Caviar Hong Kong 1KG And 1.7KG Launch by Nomad Caviar's Online Shop HK
articles.summary: NOMAD Caviar is introducing sustainably farmed, premium caviar to consumers in Hong Kong. The company offers Kaluga Hybrid and Ossetra caviar, sourced responsibly, and provides an online platform for convenient purchase and delivery throughout Hong Kong.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Future Smartphone Form Factors: Flex G Tri-Fold Display and Expandable Screens for 2026
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung plans to release the Flex G tri-fold smartphone in 2026, featuring a second-generation tri-fold design with two outer panels that fold inward, safeguarding a 10-inch tablet-sized display. The Flex G features a dual-hinge design that enhances durability and allows for a more seamless transition between smartphone and tablet modes and includes reinforced hinges and a protective layer over the display to minimize wear and tear. The company is also exploring expandable displays for future devices.

articles.title: Now introducing a true floor cleaner: Dyson's new thorough cleaning device
articles.summary: Dyson has unveiled the Dyson WashG1, a new cordless floor-washing machine designed to remove wet and dry dirt simultaneously. The WashG1 features independently powered rollers, separation technology for easy maintenance, and customizable water dispersion. It includes a 1-liter clean water tank and offers thorough cleaning for floors and surfaces in large spaces.

articles.title: 'Debut economy' just what doctor ordered
articles.author: 闫星周
articles.summary: Lynk & Co introduced their first all-electric SUV, the Z20, in Shanghai on December 22. This debut is part of a larger trend in China called the "debut economy," where companies strategically launch new products, technologies, or services to generate consumer excitement and drive purchasing behavior.

articles.title: Krafton and Nvidia team up to create smarter AI characters for PUBG and inZOI
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: Nvidia and Krafton introduced on-device AI. This AI will enable smarter AI characters for PUBG and inZoi.

articles.title: This High-End Robot Vac's Price Just Plummeted by $800 at Amazon
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Dreame is offering its robot vacuum at its lowest price, allowing consumers to integrate it into their smart homes.

articles.title: This Tiny MagSafe Battery Pack Is Only $20 When You Use This Offer Code
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Lisen's MagSafe battery pack is now available at a new record low price, offering consumers a significant discount.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Seattle PI
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allows Prime members to try on select apparel items at home before purchasing. Customers could order up to six items on a trial basis.

articles.title: LlamaV-o1 is the AI model that explains its thought process—here's why that matters
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: MBZUAI launched LlamaV-o1, a new AI model. This model revolutionizes multimodal reasoning. It provides transparent step-by-step explanations across text and visual tasks and outperforms competitors in speed and accuracy.

articles.title: Genesis Comes Of Age With A New GV70, Track-Ready Magma, More Dealers
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Genesis is evolving its retail strategy, moving beyond a niche market presence.

articles.title: As League of Legends players blast 800-hour grinds, Riot says this "wasn't meant to get ...
articles.author: Games Radar
articles.summary: League of Legends players are experiencing a significant change regarding the time it takes to unlock new champions for free. The lead gameplay designer acknowledged that the change to unlocking new champions via Blue Essence wasn't meant to get harder, indicating a potential issue with the game's current system.

articles.title: China's robotics company showcases new tech at CES
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Wisson Robotics presented an array of universal soft robotics technology and products. These soft robots, utilizing flexible materials and designs, are designed for complex environments and diverse tasks across various industries, which were showcased at the 2025 Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas.

articles.title: Whirlpool's answer to inflation: Charging more for fewer parts and less paint
articles.author: Grand Rapids Business Journal
articles.summary: Whirlpool Corp. introduced a new washing machine with a modern muted veneer, priced $100 higher than previous models. This new product reflects the company's focus on permanent cost takeout.

articles.title: Startup unveils marketplace for Nigerian businesses
articles.author: Justice Okamgba
articles.summary: EGORAS, a Nigerian technology startup, has launched Egomart, a marketplace connecting businesses with over 100,000 active customers. Egomart serves as a hub for diverse offerings like electronics, generators, and hospitality services, providing merchants with immediate access to a large market. The platform incentivizes both customers and merchants through a unique cashback system.
